name: Candy Cane Sugar
description:
Match the iced gems, candies and other sweet treats to beat the score goals. Avoid candy cane obstacles and falling blockers, helped along by exploding Christmas puddings, Santa hats and sweets in this fun, short, casual game.

There are three goal targets: activate the first star to avoid losing; activate the third to win the level.

Planned for next update

- More levels

- Best score

Programming: Jo Weber

Music: JBD Artist, Frankum, Nicolas Jeudy (Dark Fantasy Studio)

SoundFX: SunnySideSound, Retainna, Soughtaftersounds @ Freesound

Tutorials, additional resources: Wilmer Lin, James Doyle

Models: Ricimi Designs
